top.title: Russia bombards Ukraine as US says progress made in talks with Kyiv
top.summary: President Zelensky says an attack on a rail hub near Kyiv was "meaningless from a military point of view".

top.title: At least 11 killed in South Africa mass shooting
top.summary: Gunmen stormed a hostel near Pretoria and opened fire, killing 11 people including a three-year-old.

top.title: Deadly border fighting breaks out between Pakistan and Afghanistan
top.summary: Both sides accuse the other of starting the overnight fighting and breaching a fragile ceasefire agreed in October.

top.title: Twitch star QTCinderella says she wishes she never started streaming
top.summary: The Streamer Awards organiser said the negatives of her online role made it hard to enjoy the job.

top.title: US hits out at EU's 'suffocating regulations' after it fines Elon Musk's X
top.summary: The European Commission says the social media site is opening its users up to scams and impersonations.

top.title: Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom
top.summary: The regulator tells the BBC it has been emailing AVS Group Ltd without reply since July.

title.#text: Welcome to the big leagues, Netflix
Chamberlain blocks smart home integrations with its garage door openers — again
